nodes.text: "Run Mace Run" is a 20-page story featured in Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures Volume 2. It was written and drawn by the Fillbach Brothers, colored by Wil Glass, and lettered by Michael David Thomas.
On the planet Omphalos, Mace Windu's LAAT/i is shot down, and with his clone troopers dead, he runs to disable the prototype Planet Killer before its creators can show it to Count Dooku.
